name: Gherkin Battle
description:
Disclaimer

This game was created for a game jam in less than 3 hours so please excuse the lack of polish.

Game

Bring the gherkin as fast as possible to the goal while your buddy tries to slow you down by clicking on balloons or putting stones in your way.


Controls Player 1:

[A] or [LEFT]: move left

[D] or [RIGHT]: move right

[SPACE]: jump

Player 2:

[Left-Click]: pop balloon

[Right-Click]: spawn rock
